rooms.name: Open-plan Living & Kitchen
rooms.description: A combined living room and kitchen space that maximizes openness and connectivity. The layout adheres to Vastu principles by orienting the entrance in the east, ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated space for entertainment located in a quiet corner of the ground floor. It respects Vastu guidelines by maintaining balance and symmetry with adjacent spaces.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A flexible space that can serve as a dining area or a study, incorporating Vastu principles by orienting seating towards the north.

openings.description: Main entrance oriented to the east, aligning with Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Direct access to the two-car garage from the ground floor, ensuring ease of ingress and egress without disturbing living spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with ample natural light, designed for relaxation. The layout follows Vastu guidelines by positioning the bed in the south-east corner.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: A small outdoor space adjoining the master bedroom for fresh air and sunlight, ensuring adherence to Vastu by providing a balance between indoor and outdoor spaces.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: A compact study area designed to support work-from-home scenarios with Vastu considerations for concentration and energy flow.

openings.description: A compact staircase designed for efficient vertical circulation between floors while maintaining a modern aesthetic.
Main garage entry for two-car capacity, designed with ample space and integrated security features.
